meanings.definition: A group of metallic elements in the periodic table, including cerium, lanthanum, and neodymium.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the lanthanides to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: The lanthanides are essential in the production of high-tech devices.
meanings.sent3: The lanthanides decided to throw a party in the periodic table.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry shone brightly, like the lanthanides in the periodic table.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the lanthanides make them stand out among other elements.
